abstract.text: Paragraph or ruler attributes in an attributed string.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: A paragraph style object represents a complex attribute value in an attributed string, storing a number of subattributes that affect paragraph layout for the characters of the string. Among these subattributes are alignment, tab stops, writing direction, line-breaking mode, and indentation settings.

abstract.text: Create text layouts, optimize font handling, and access font metrics and glyph data.
